welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shelton, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that Shelton has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Waterbury-Oxford Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Waterbury-Oxford Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Haven Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
